subject: New Design contest: $1,200 in prizes
body:
Hello sm1lies,

We've got a new Design contest open today -- the .NET Fax Manager Version 1.0 -- with $1,200 in total prizes.

The Fax Manager Version 1.0 component will provide a Facade to the MS Fax Server component. It will accept the basic cover sheet information and a PDF and then send the fax using the MS Fax Server. The technologies involved include .NET 2.0 and Windows Server 2003. 

Learn more and register here: http://www.topcoder.com/tc?module=ProjectDetail&pj=30001914

Good luck!

- The TopCoder Software Team

===================================================================
You have received this email because you indicated in your TopCoder profile that you want to be notified of new TopCoder development opportunities.  If you no longer wish to receive these emails, login to www.topcoder.com/tc and click on 'Update My Profile'.  In the 'Email Notification' section of your TopCoder profile, you have the option to enable or disable receipt of various types of TopCoder emails.  Be sure to save any changes to your member profile.
